channel.title: [HYBRIS][Cleaned PI]Perfect ECO/PVP Server [7 quest much content] REALEASED!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24pz709.png[/img]
[center] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/xbinv9.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/8p3hgmq31k17/Hybris.rar][b]Download Server[/b][/url] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/xbinv9.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/vz1k2lrl9rmr/Hybris_Client.rar][b]Download Client[/b][/url]
[/center] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/6g8le9.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b]~ Hybris Features ~[/b][/size]
[b]Server Stability[/b] > Region clipping for both npcs and players. Absolutely no lag. > Uses cycle event manager for 90% of event processing. > Can hold up to 500+ Players without lag, has been tested. > Uses mina networking, added few packets to process immediately.
[b]Quests[/b] > 7 fully working quests. > All have quest interfaces and are managed in separation(npc clicking, button clicking, object clicking) > Correct interfaces for rewards. > All have rewards.
[b]Minigames[/b] > Fully working duel arena, all major bugs fixed. > Fully working barrows with reward chest. > Working fight pits and fight caves. > Very basic form of Castle wars. > Fully working king black dragon transportation using canoes at Lumbridge(Waka canoe)
[b]Skills:[/b] > Fully working mining with correct pickaxe animations, delays and empty rock. > Fully working woodcutting with correct animations of axes, delays, stumps. > Fully working herblore with correct herb identifying and potion creation. > Fully working firemaking using clipping via region manager with fires and ashes. > Fully working thieving, handled completely from scratch. Stalls empty and respawn with delays. > Started very basic base of runecrafting. > Mining pure essence at level 30 automatically handled with timers! >Fully working fishing with different types of fish caught at different levels. All types of fishing are handled. > Very basic base of smithing added, making bars and smithing into armour handled through interfaces. > Slayer base added. >Fully working fletching. >Fully working crafting with perfect handled gem timers.
[b]Misc features:[/b] > Fully working flax spinning into bow strings handled. > Fully working fountain filling system. > Fully working amulet of glory degrading. > Fully working dueling ring with degrading. > Added a significant amount of shops in all of the cities properly with dialogues! > Working teletab transportation. > Working ship sailing transportation. > Basic rug travel methods. > Rock crab travel at Camelot. > Re-did food eating management.
[b]PVP/COMBAT[/b] > Fully working mage, range, attack timers. > All basic spells working, ancients working, in player panel you can find Vengeance which works both on players and npcs. > PVP shop automatic updating for every kill you make. > PVP kill point system activated in wilderness. > Multi zones working correctly. > Fixed all correct arrow backs for range weapons such as Crystal bow.
[b]NPCS[/b] > Fully clipped walking! > Fully clipping following player while attacking. > Working various types of npcs (Mage,Range,Melee,Hybrids) > Several npc drops. > Traverley accessible at Barb village with all the npcs added in correct spots with their individual drops. > Dragon fireshield method added for both npcs and players.
[b][SIZE="5"]~ Hybris Server Images ~[/SIZE][/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14bp0g1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/nz5dkz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/29lfr69.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1748rt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/21bsq5l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2uzpkpt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/357mzr8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11gooxz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20tpkbc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/snclyb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/24otwn6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/55jwj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mud6ag.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2dm5l5u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/21eqiiq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25p0jm8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28mcvht.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/be7y2s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/xc7sj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/160cs5e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/x6dhlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/25p1d9t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9u23qq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/65rcit.png[/img]

You guys are retards

edit.

edit.
102ms when 1 player online doing nothing. Nicely done

It’s easy enough to make a damn compiler… If you can’t do that, then why are you coding?!?
